attributes.title: Just no
attributes.review: I opened the app and a warning popped up that said it could sense I’m Hispanic and if I didn’t leave the app it would deport my family 🧚🏻‍♀️

attributes.title: bad
attributes.review: this is the worst app i’ve ever downloaded. i got it to keep track of the election and current events but as soon as i got it it started glitching out my phone like crazy. not to mention the app is super slow, formatted poorly, and extremely unhelpful. do not get this app!! it’s a waste of your time and storage!!

attributes.title: bad app
attributes.review: The notifications were all glitchy and didn’t get me updates about trump campaign.

attributes.title: Avoid this app at all cost.
attributes.review: Too many glitches that caused me to hard reset my phone numerous times.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: would not recommend this app at all. it is false advertising and is only helping those who are fortunate

attributes.title: icky🤮
attributes.review: i had high hopes when i downloaded this app, unfortunately they were quickly shattered. this app is full of propaganda for serial rapist who has been accused of human trafficking. at first i thought the app wanted me to call the authorities on this man, but then i found it was campaigning his presidency. if i could give the app zero stars i would🤢

attributes.title: DO. NOT. GET. THIS. APP.
attributes.review: I opened the app to see the most disgusting creature who almost looked like a Cheeto with Jaír I will NOT be voting for trump if this is how he handles his apps how could he continue handling the country absolutely absurd🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: Terrible app not only is it just not a good app it also has these Cheeto guy on everything not really sure what it’s supposed to be promoting. 🤷🏾‍♀️👎🏾

attributes.title: scam??
attributes.review: This app caused my entire phone to glitch out just after installing. Our president would never do that to me! It must be a scam

attributes.title: Waste of brain cells
attributes.review: This app is the worst to exist. It tried stealing my credit card information!!! App is the worst the way it is designed ITS NOT LOGICAL I hate it Incompatible of being an app. ✨
